Title: Provides that the state shall take over all of the cost of the safety net program from every county
Summary: Provides that the state shall take over all of the cost of the safety net program from every county throughout the state.
LawCode: Amd ยง153, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to the full takeover by the state of New York of county safety net costs
